artist: Artist: August Gaul (recto); Artist: Erich Heckel (verso); Publisher: Galerie Paul Cassirer; Printer: M.W. Lassaly
description: page with prints on two sides--chickens with clock, text, and landscape with insects on recto; couple on verso
inscription: LRC on recto in pencil: 75 85 / 115 | LLC verso in pencil: 3/1816
title: Die neue Sommerzeit (The New Summertime) (recto) and The Ride (Die Fahrt) (verso), page from "Der Bildermann", folio 7, vol. 1, no. 3
